ref.div: Nachtergaele FO, van Velthuizen H, Verelst L, Batjes NH, Dijkshoorn JA, van Engelen VWP, et al. Harmonized world soil database (version 1.0). Food and Agric Organization of the UN (FAO); International Inst. for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA); ISRIC-World Soil Information; Inst of Soil Science-Chinese Acad of Sciences (ISS-CAS); EC-Joint Research Centre (JRC); 2008.
